1. Miss Congeniality (2000) - This comedy-drama film stars Julia Stiles as Gracie Hart, a tomboyish detective who is made to infiltrate the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant after her department learns that the event is under threat from an anonymous bomber.
  1. The Life of David Gale (2003) - This psychological thriller film stars Kevin Spacey as David Gale, a man against capital punishment who is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.
  1. Frankenweenie (2012) - This animated fantasy film stars Charlie Tahan as Victor Frankenstein and Conchata Ferrell as Elizabeth Frankenstein, the two scientists who create a monster by combining their bodies in a laboratory setting.
  1. The River (1991) - This documentary short film looks at the devastating and costly problems, including seasonal flooding and erosion of precious topsoil, associated with the Mississippi River system and promotes more Federal projects to remedy the situation.

1. Title: Compliance (2012)
   Plot: A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.
   Starring: James McCaffrey, Matt Servitto, Dreama Walker
   Recommendation: This movie follows the story of Compliance, which is based on true events. The movie portrays the lengths to which some individuals will go to cover up their crimes, even if it means sacrificing their own lives. The movie also highlights the importance of integrity and honesty in all aspects of life, including business and government. Overall, this movie provides an insightful and thought-provoking look at the darker aspects of human nature, while also highlighting the importance of integrity and honesty in all aspects of life.

2. Title: My Own Private Idaho (1991)
   Plot: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.
   Starring: James Russo, Flea, Chiara Caselli, River Phoenix, Udo Kier, Udo Kier, Keanu Reeves, Keanu Reeves
   Recommendation: This movie is an adaptation of the novel "My Own Private Idaho" by Jim Thompson. The movie tells the story of two best friends, Michael and Paul, living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.
The movie also features several well-known actors, including River Phoenix, Keanu Reeves, Udo Kier, Flea, Chiara Caselli, James Russo, James Russo.

In conclusion, both "Compliance" and "My Own Private Idaho" are excellent movies that provide insightful and thought-provoking looks at various aspects of human nature. The main difference between the two movies is their genres. "Compliance" is a drama movie, while "My Own Private Idaho" is an adventure thriller movie.
